thread.title: Damian Hla
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Damian Hla

author: Damian Hla
title: Damian Hla
text:
Excellent customer service.
Great follow-up and communication.
Shipping is super-fast. In most cases, next day delivery.
I had issues with some of my equipment and the staff at StoreDJ helped greatly to resolve. And on each occasion they replaced my faulty equipment with new unit to ensure minimal downtime. Kudos to their excellent customer service.
